article_title: CVS Health Pharmacy Business Overcomes Loss Of Tobacco Sales

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: CVS Health (CVS), which no longer sells cigarettes and other tobacco sales, is generating better than expected sales from new business across all lines including drugstores, retail clinics and its pharmacy benefit management company. Though the loss of tobacco sales hurt sales in the front of its stores, CVS chief executive [...]
